All Classes All Packages

D

decrypt(BigInteger, BigInteger[], BigInteger, BigInteger) - Static method in class knapsack
Takes a sigle block of an encrypted message, and decrypts it, by using the private sequence that is provided, to solve the Knapsack problem of finding the original bits of the message.

E

encrypt(byte[], BigInteger[]) - Static method in class knapsack
Encrypt method that takes in an byte array that is the message, as well as the public sequence, then for each byte in the message, computes each bit in the byte, then adds the corresponding number in the public sequence to the encrypted message.

K

knapsack - Class in <Unnamed>

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class knapsack
main method to test and utilize all methods defined in this document.

P

printArray(byte[]) - Static method in class knapsack

Prints out a BigInteger array.
printAsTable(byte[], int[]) - Static method in class knapsack
 
printDoubleArray(byte[][]) - Static method in class knapsack
prints out a double byte array.
printDoubleArray(int[][]) - Static method in class knapsack
 
privateSequence(int, int) - Static method in class knapsack
This method returns a superincreasing sequence with a given length, where the first number has at most a given number of bits.
publicSequence(BigInteger[], BigInteger, BigInteger) - Static method in class knapsack
Takes a private sequence and uses the given multiplier and modulus to convert it into a public sequence, if the multiplier is chosen well, then this will hide the details of the private sequence, so the encrypted message created with this public sequence is secure.

S

split(String, int) - Static method in class knapsack
This method takes in the name of a file, as well as a length.

T

toByte(boolean[]) - Static method in class knapsack
helper method that takes a boolean array and turns in into an integer.
